Text:
Hi JMZ,

Thanks for all the uploads.

There's a problem with this set - it's a mess. Most
of the songs have been folded to mono and the
sound is muffled. What were they thinking?

Oldies Guy
I don't know, i'll have a listen to see if i have the same problem.
What tracks are you hearing the "muffled" sound??

All the cuts are muffled except 108, 116,302, & 311.

It sounds like they took stereo songs and folded
them to mono - which causes problems. In this
case, the vocals are down in the mix and the
songs are distorted and muffled.  At first I thought
it was the torrent, but the above songs are fine.
Beats me what happened.  Do the original cd's
sound OK? Are they stereo?

Oldies Guy
Well i'm not hearing anything wrong and im using some high end headphones.. maybe if CUSTODES notices they will release a PROPER if so i'll upload it.
